about_the_game:
In the Siberian cold, Mariska and a stranger ride in a truck: The Firebird. Pursued by the mafia, they try to escape to the North, where legends come to life, in order to save a village forgotten by all.



Firebird is a narrative road trip taking place in the steppes of the Great North. Travel around Russia in your truck, manage its condition and fuel and choose the best route. Will you manage to get your truck to its destination without succumbing to the dangers of this hostile land?



Firebird is a game halfway between the Choose Your Own Adventure book and the Visual Novel, inspired by the legends of Russian folklore. You will meet many characters during your journey, some friendly, others much less so... The adventure is magnified by the illustrations hand-composed by Quentin Vijoux

Features :
- A story written by FibreTigre, the author behind the Out There saga and the Game of Roles show.
- A unique narrative road trip to discover during an evening (1h30 approximately)
- Many places to explore across the map: from the industrial city of Norilsk to the Kara Sea, Russia offers many places to visit.
- Hand-composed illustrations by Quentin Vijoux, influenced by Russian folklore and its representations.
- More than twenty colorful characters to meet during your adventures
- A resource system impacted by your decisions
- An original soundtrack by Franck Weber
